name: Swiss Business Class Flight Report | Bombardier CS100 | Manchester to Zurich
description:
Review of Swiss European Business Class onboard Bombardier CS100 HB-JBA operating flight LX379 from Manchester to Zurich.  

Full flight: https://youtu.be/y95fIO6BVNI

BECOME AN INFLIGHT VIDEO VIP AT http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTSMY CAMERA GEAR: https://www.amazon.com/shop/inflightvideo

PATREON: http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

Our journey today begins at Manchester Airport's Terminal 1, before we go through fast track security and visit the Aspire Lounge.  Once we leave the lounge we board for our flight and have a very enjoyable trip to Zurich onboard the Bombardier C Series CS100.  On arrival we take the Business Class bus to the terminal.
